DataElement.preferredName: Medical Care Related To Donation Reason Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The reason indicator that describes whether or not the medical care was related to donation.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Negation Relationship To Bone Marrow Donation

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Negation Relationship To Bone Marrow Donation
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: Traditionally, minor surgery to draw marrow from the hipbones followed by collection of the stems cells from the donated marrow. Today the most common way of collecting the stem cells is by filtering them directly from the blood. Although this procedure is technically called peripheral blood stem cell donation, it is still commonly referred to as bone marrow donation.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.

Traditionally, minor surgery to draw marrow from the hipbones followed by collection of the stems cells from the donated marrow. Today the most common way of collecting the stem cells is by filtering them directly from the blood. Although this procedure is technically called peripheral blood stem cell donation, it is still commonly referred to as bone marrow donation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: Traditionally, minor surgery to draw marrow from the hipbones followed by collection of the stems cells from the donated marrow. Today the most common way of collecting the stem cells is by filtering them directly from the blood. Although this procedure is technically called peripheral blood stem cell donation, it is still commonly referred to as bone marrow donation.

Concepts.definition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.

Traditionally, minor surgery to draw marrow from the hipbones followed by collection of the stems cells from the donated marrow. Today the most common way of collecting the stem cells is by filtering them directly from the blood. Although this procedure is technically called peripheral blood stem cell donation, it is still commonly referred to as bone marrow donation.
